name: Glacial Rush
description:
In Glacial Rush you will have to control Fins, a penguin separated from his family by the destruction of an iceberg. Reach the end before time runs out to meet your fate.

To reach the end of this adventure you will have to dodge Orcas and Walruses, in addition to not slipping on the oil slick. If you need help getting through the game, eating fish is a good way to extend the life of Fins.

This game is inspired by the constant danger that penguins are subjected to due to climate change, pollution in the oceans or overfishing. And this is what we have reflected in our game, the race of an animal species against the dangers that lie in wait for it.

Credits

Jorge Pan - UI Designer and Programmer

Lucía Blázquez - Artist, Designer and Story Writter

Andrés Hormigo - Game Designer, Programmer and Story Writter
